name: yauzl-mac
description: Unzipping with yauzl with added support for Mac OS Archive Utility ZIP files

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run test-main
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover-main && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.cover-main: cross-env COVERAGE=true istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -t 10000 -R spec "test/**/*.test.js"
scripts.travis: if [ $COVERAGE ]; then npm run coveralls; else npm test; fi
